item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Its that time of year again where we re-live some of the good times of socialization we had all summer long at our paddling events and look forward to the New Year ahead.

Tina has again been gracious in opening up her home for us to celebrate New Years.

Over the past few years this has been the best and safest option i have found to celebrate with friends new and old.

Please be generous in return by bringing good things to eat and drink along with any other good ideas.


See ya all at the party if you are interested.

Al-r

____________________________________________________________________________


What: New Year's Eve Party

When: Friday, December 31, 2010, 7:00 PM

Where: Tina's Home in Meriden CT close to the I- 91 and rt 15 split (exact address to be provided later closer to the event)


Time to Bring Out the DANCE CAGE!!!!
-->
Ring in the New Year with good friends, old and new, at Tina's home in Meriden.
--->
Dance in the cage,
-->
shoot some pool,
-->
get hot in the hot tub . . .DO NOT PEE IN THE TUB OR THE WATER TURNS INSTANTLY TO BLUE AND THE OFFENDER IS SPOTTED !!!
-->
whatever suits your fancy,
-->
just come ready to PARTY!!!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bring a dish for the table (bring what you like and some more, can be some main dish, desert, or something healthy..etc), a happy party attitude, and don't forget
your favorite beverage.

Additional Driving Directions, expected Weather Conditions and if necessary alternate options in case of BAD weather conditions will be provided closer to the event also.

Worried about driving home? Bring a sleeping bag and stay the
night.

See you there!
Tina
item.how_to_find_us: Look for ORANGE STRIPED TRAFFIC CONES by the street and home area once i get there.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Celebrating the last Dec 31 of 2010
